DOC.brief_summary: Phase 2 study involve determine consumption cheese compare non-dairy cheese substitute influence inflammation six hour period .
DOC.brief_title: Determine How Consumption Dairy Fat Cheese Influences Inflammation-Phase 2
DOC.detailed_description: Phase 2 randomize crossover study design determine consumption cheese compare non-dairy cheese substitute influence postprandial inflammation participant 2 risk factor metabolic syndrome BMI â‰¥ 30 . Eligible participant arrive Western Human Nutrition Research Center ( WHNRC ) University California ( UC ) Davis campus morning test day 10-12-hr overnight fast . Upon arrival participant fill questionnaire dietary medication intake physical activity past 72 hour ensure compliance . Compliant participant ' weight blood pressure measure fast blood draw take participant consume test meal ( cheese non-dairy cheese substitute ) . Participants consume test meal water freely duration test day . Blood drawn serially 1 , 3 6 hour postprandially . Participants test second test day two week first test . On second test day , participant ' body composition bone mineral density measure dual x-ray absorptiometry .
DOC.criteria: Age 1865 year Two component metabolic syndrome : Central obesity ( waist circumference great 40 inch men 35 inch woman ) ; fast blood triglyceride great equal 150 mg/dL ; plasma HDL cholesterol ( Less 40 mg/dL men less 50 mg/dL woman ) ; blood pressure great equal 130/85 mmHg ; fast glucose great equal 100 mg/dL BMI equal great 30 Metabolic Disorders : BMI > 40 Body weight 400 lb . Any immune related disease autoimmune disease , rheumatoid arthritis , asthma , Gastrointestinal disorder include Crohn 's Disease , colitis , diverticulitis , irritable bowel disease , celiac , malabsorption syndrome Cancer Known presence significant metabolic disease could impact result study ( i.e . hepatic , renal disease ) Type II diabetes Use overthecounter antiobesity agent ( e.g . contain phenylpropanolamine , ephedrine , and/or caffeine ) within last 12 week Use corticoid steroid within last 12 week Daily use antiinflammatory pain medication Self report eat disorder Poor vein assessment determine WHNRC 's phlebotomist Dietary/supplements : Known allergy intolerance study food ( lactose intolerance , dairy , wheat allergy ) Vegetarian ( define abstinence consumption egg , dairy , poultry , beef pork ) More 1 serve fish per week More 14 gram fiber per 1000 kcal per day Less 16:1 total dietary omega 6 : Omega 3 ratio More 1 % daily energy trans fat Initiation antiinflammatory supplemental fish , krill , flax , borage primrose seed oil within last 12 week Dietary supplement consist concentrated soy isoflavones , resveratrol , polyphenols identify modulators inflammation Medications Initiation statin therapy within last 12 week Lifestyle More 10 % weight loss gain past 6 month Recent initiation ( past 4 week ) exercise program Plan become pregnant next 6 month Pregnancy lactation Recent initiation cessation hormonal birth control change hormonal birth control regimen within last 12 week Use tobacco product More 2 standard alcoholic drink per day .
